definition.name: Azure Machine Learning Run Action
definition.description: Submit a run to an Azure Machine Learning Workspace with this GitHub Action
definition.author: azure/gh-aml

inputs.name: azure_credentials
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name <your-sp-name> --role contributor --scopes /subscriptions/<your-subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/<your-rg> --sdk-auth` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: parameters_file
inputs.description: JSON file including the parameters of the run.

outputs.name: experiment_name
outputs.description: Name of the experiment of the run

outputs.name: run_url
outputs.description: URL to the run in the Azure Machine Learning Studio

outputs.name: run_metrics
outputs.description: Metrics of the run (will only be provided if wait_for_completion is set to True)

outputs.name: run_metrics_markdown
outputs.description: Metrics of the run formatted as markdown table (will only be provided if wait_for_completion is set to True)

outputs.name: published_pipeline_id
outputs.description: Id of the publised pipeline (will only be provided if you submitted a pipeline and pipeline_publish is set to True)

outputs.name: published_pipeline_status
outputs.description: Status of the publised pipeline (will only be provided if you submitted a pipeline and pipeline_publish is set to True)

outputs.name: published_pipeline_endpoint
outputs.description: Endpoint of the publised pipeline (will only be provided if you submitted a pipeline and pipeline_publish is set to True)

outputs.name: artifact_path
outputs.description: Path of downloaded artifacts and logs from Azure Machine Learning (pipeline) run (will only be provided if wait_for_completion and download_artifacts is set to True)
